isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB - TILT: 9600 AND 9700 SLEEPER AND NON-SLEEPER CABS - WINDSHIELD GLASS

svcsubsecinfo.para: The windshield is of the two-piece curved glass type. A molded one-piece, two section weatherseal with an integral or detached insert (zipper strip) fits the perimeter of glass to retain glass on fence of windshield opening. The separation between windshield halves is accomplished by a molded divider seal which is part of the one-piece seal ( Figure 22). The divider seal is held in place by the divider bar which is attached to the body cowl and roof. When replacing the windshield, examine the seal for cuts, cracks, distortion or signs of leaking. If any of these signs is present, replace the windshield seal.
